name: pin-unpin-tab
description: Pin or unpin a tab through the toolbar icon, or a keyboard shortcut, or a left long-click anywhere on the page.
author: Jayesh Bhoot

scripts.build: mel build && esbuild src/bg.bs.js --bundle --outfile=src/bg.prod.js && esbuild src/long_click.bs.js --bundle --outfile=src/long_click.prod.js && esbuild src/prefs.bs.js --bundle --outfile=src/prefs.prod.js
scripts.@comment:dev: double backslashes are needed escape the backslash itself to satisfy json parsing. bash should need only a single backslash, to escape the parentheses.
scripts.build:ext: npm run build && web-ext build --ignore-files=_build _opam .idea node_modules web-ext-artifacts .envrc .gitignore .merlin .ocamlformat bsconfig.json dune dune-project dune.mel flake.* package*.json src/*.ml
scripts.build:src-zip: zip -r src-pkg.zip.tmp src/*.bs.js src/*.html src/*.css *.md manifest.json package.json && rm -rf src-pkg.zip && mv src-pkg.zip.tmp src-pkg.zip
